subTag: Present Worth and Net Present and Benefit Value
situation: A new plant to produce steel tubing requires an initial investment of 10 M dollars. It is expected that after 3 years of operation an additional investment of 5 M dollars will be required and after 6 years of operation another investment of 3 M dollars. Annual operating costs will be 3 M dollars and annual revenue will be 8 M dollars. The life of the plant is 10 years. If the interest rate is 15% per year, compounded annually, what is net present value (NPV) of this plant?
